title: Diamond Floral Addigai - A Timeless South Indian Classic
materials: Ethically Sourced Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G-H Color). Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: A delicate and modern interpretation of the traditional Addigai. The necklace features a stylized floral design, intricately set with pave diamonds. The geometric arrangement adds a contemporary touch while maintaining a classic South Indian aesthetic. Perfect blend of traditional 'Addigai' form with modern diamond setting.
colors: Rose Gold with sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. A stunning piece for a modern bride or for adding a touch of elegance to any formal attire. Suitable for half-saree function as well.
description: Crafted with the highest quality diamonds and exquisite craftsmanship. This Addigai is a modern heirloom, combining timeless elegance with contemporary design. The delicate floral motif symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings. The rose gold complements all skin tones, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. A true statement piece!
